text:
No. 
My advice? Download the ISOs
(en-us_windows_11_business_editions_version_23h2_x64_dvd_a9092734.iso\mul_windows_11_languages_and_optional_features_x64_dvd_dbe9044b.iso),
wait for this month's LCU, then service the WIM as per normal. 
Business as usual.
%40googlegroups.com
